actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Big Blue Wilderness, Courthouse Mountain Wilderness, Dolores Park Wilderness, Sneffels Wilderness, and Mount Wilson Wilderness, San Juan and Uncompahgre National Forests in the State of Colorado.

summary.text: Designates the following as wilderness: Big Blue Wilderness, Courthouse Mountain Wilderness, Dolores Peak Wilderness, Mount Sneffels Wilderness, and Mount Wilson Wilderness, in the San Juan and Uncompahgre National Forests, Colorado.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Big Blue Wilderness, Courthouse Mountain Wilderness, Dolores Park Wilderness, Sneffels Wilderness, and Mount Wilson Wilderness, San Juan and Uncompahgre National Forests in the State of Colorado.
